item.title: Evaluating LLMs is a minefield
item.description:
...many things can go wrong when we are trying to evaluate LLMsâ€™ performance on a certain task or behavior in a certain scenario.

It has big implications for reproducibility: both for research on LLMs and research that uses LLMs to answer a question in social science or any other field.
